location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to James Farish, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of the commands of the Bombay Government dated 30 April 1811, which authorised the Resident at Bushire to draw on the Marine Paymaster for sums of money required by the Marine Agent.
